title: Condense Content into Headlines
original_prompt: Condense Each Section into a Ten-Word or Less Heading, Presented in a Tabular Format Displaying Titles Exclusively, Excluding Original Content and Numeration.
input1: Project Overview: Goals, Objectives, and Key Deliverables Summary
input2: Team Roles: Responsibilities, Skills Required, and Collaboration Strategies
input1_ans: | Project Overview: Goals, Objectives, and Key Deliverables Summary |

| Title                       |
|-----------------------------|
| Project Overview            |
| Goals                       |
| Objectives                  |
| Key Deliverables            |
input2_ans:
| Team Roles Overview          |
|------------------------------|
| Responsibilities of Team Roles|
| Required Skills for Roles    |
| Collaboration Strategies      |

| Team Role       | Responsibilities          | Skills Required         | Collaboration Strategies  |
|------------------|---------------------------|-------------------------|---------------------------|
| Project Manager   | Oversee project execution  | Leadership, Planning     | Regular updates, Meetings  |
| Developer         | Code and implement features| Programming, Problem-solving| Code reviews, Pair programming |
| Designer          | Create visual elements     | Creativity, UX/UI design | Design sprints, Feedback sessions |
| Tester            | Ensure product quality     | Attention to detail, Testing| Test cases, Bug tracking   |
| Business Analyst  | Analyze requirements       | Analytical, Communication | Workshops, Stakeholder meetings |
